description: Advances from a small village to a bustling town, ready to expand rapidly. Kush Workers garther grain 5% faster, archers gain 2 ranges but 5% more train time.
tooltip: Advance to Town Phase, which unlocks more entities and technologies.  Civic Centers +25% territory influence radius, 25% more garrison capacity and +5 range. Structures +10% damage and +7 capture points regeneration rate per garrisoned unit. All Citizens 10% more health>  Workers 10% faster farming. Archers 5% faster and 10% more accurate.
